entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 12 this evening. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Friday 30 December 2022
